en.AcknowledgmentsDescription: Contains a list of acknowledgment elements.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsDescription: Acknowledges contributions by describing those that contributed.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsNamesDescription: Contains the names of entities being recognized.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsNamesItemsDescriptio: Contains the name of a single person.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsOrganizationDescript: Contains the name of a contributing organization being recognized.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsSummaryDescription: SHOULD represent any contextual details the document producers wish to make known about the acknowledgment or acknowledged parties.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsUrlsDescription: Specifies a list of URLs or location of the reference to be acknowledged.
en.AcknowledgmentsItemsUrlsItemsDescription: Contains the URL or location of the reference to be acknowledged.
en.BranchesDescription: Contains branch elements as children of the current element.
en.BranchesItemsDescription: Is a part of the hierarchical structure of the product tree.
en.BranchesItemsCategoryDescription: Describes the characteristics of the labeled branch.
en.BranchesItemsNameDescription: Contains the canonical descriptor or 'friendly name' of the branch.
en.FullProductNameDescription: Specifies information about the product and assigns the product_id.
en.FullProductNameNameDescription: The value should be the productâ€™s full canonical name, including version number and other attributes, as it would be used in a human-friendly document.
en.FullProductNameProductIdentificationHelp: Provides at least one method which aids in identifying the product in an asset database.
The Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) attribute refers to a method for naming platforms external to this specification.
Contains a list of cryptographic hashes usable to identify files.
Contains all information to identify a file based on its cryptographic hash values.
Contains a list of cryptographic hashes for this file.
Contains one hash value and algorithm of the file to be identified.
Contains the name of the cryptographic hash algorithm used to calculate the value.
Contains the cryptographic hash value in hexadecimal representation.
Contains the name of the file which is identified by the hash values.
Contains a list of parts, or full model numbers.
Contains a part, or a full model number of the component to identify.
The package URL (purl) attribute refers to a method for reliably identifying and locating software packages external to this specification.
Contains a list of URLs where SBOMs for this product can be retrieved.
Contains a URL of one SBOM for this product.
Contains a list of parts, or full serial numbers.
Contains a part, or a full serial number of the component to identify.
Contains a list of parts, or full stock keeping units.
Contains a part, or a full stock keeping unit (SKU) which is used in the ordering process to identify the component.
Contains a list of identifiers which are either vendor-specific or derived from a standard not yet supported.
Provides a generic extension point for any identifier which is either vendor-specific or derived from a standard not yet supported.
Refers to a URL which provides the name and knowledge about the specification used or is the namespace in which these values are valid.
en.LangDescription: Identifies a language, corresponding to IETF BCP 47 / RFC 5646. See IETF language registry: https://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry/language-subtag-registry
en.NotesDescription: Contains notes which are specific to the current context.
en.NotesItemsDescription: Is a place to put all manner of text blobs related to the current context.
en.NotesItemsAudienceDescription: Indicate who is intended to read it.
en.NotesItemsCategoryDescription: Choice of what kind of note this is.
en.NotesItemsTextDescription: The contents of the note. Content varies depending on type.
en.NotesItemsTitleDescription: Provides a concise description of what is contained in the text of the note.
en.ProductGroupIdLabel: Reference token for product group instance
en.ProductGroupIdDescription: Token required to identify a group of products so that it can be referred to from other parts in the document. There is no predefined or required format for the product_group_id as long as it uniquely identifies a group in the context of the current document.
en.ProductGroupsDescription: Specifies a list of product_group_ids to give context to the parent item.
en.ProductIdDescription: Token required to identify a full_product_name so that it can be referred to from other parts in the document. There is no predefined or required format for the product_id as long as it uniquely identifies a product in the context of the current document.
en.ProductsDescription: Specifies a list of product_ids to give context to the parent item.
en.ReferencesItemsDescription: Holds any reference to conferences, papers, advisories, and other resources that are related and considered related to either a surrounding part of or the entire document and to be of value to the document consumer.
en.ReferencesItemsCategoryDescription: Indicates whether the reference points to the same document or vulnerability in focus (depending on scope) or to an external resource.
en.ReferencesItemsSummaryDescription: Indicates what this reference refers to.
en.ReferencesItemsUrlDescription: Provides the URL for the reference.
en.VersionDescription: Specifies a version string to denote clearly the evolution of the content of the document. Format must be either integer or semantic versioning.
en.DocumentDescription: Captures the meta-data about this document describing a particular set of security advisories.
en.DocumentAcknowledgmentsDescription: Contains a list of acknowledgment elements associated with the whole document.
en.DocumentAggregateSeverityDescription: Is a vehicle that is provided by the document producer to convey the urgency and criticality with which the one or more vulnerabilities reported should be addressed. It is a document-level metric and applied to the document as a whole â€” not any specific vulnerability. The range of values in this field is defined according to the document producer's policies and procedures.
en.DocumentAggregateSeverityNamespaceDescri: Points to the namespace so referenced.
en.DocumentAggregateSeverityTextDescription: Provides a severity which is independent of - and in addition to - any other standard metric for determining the impact or severity of a given vulnerability (such as CVSS).
en.DocumentCategoryDescription: Defines a short canonical name, chosen by the document producer, which will inform the end user as to the category of document.
en.DocumentCsafVersionDescription: Gives the version of the CSAF specification which the document was generated for.
en.DocumentDistributionDescription: Describe any constraints on how this document might be shared.
en.DocumentDistributionTextDescription: Provides a textual description of additional constraints.
en.DocumentDistributionTlpDescription: Provides details about the TLP classification of the document.
en.DocumentDistributionTlpLabelDescription: Provides the TLP label of the document.
en.DocumentDistributionTlpUrlDescription: Provides a URL where to find the textual description of the TLP version which is used in this document. Default is the URL to the definition by FIRST.
en.DocumentLangDescription: Identifies the language used by this document, corresponding to IETF BCP 47 / RFC 5646.
en.DocumentNotesDescription: Holds notes associated with the whole document.
en.DocumentPublisherDescription: Provides information about the publisher of the document.
en.DocumentPublisherCategoryDescription: Provides information about the category of publisher releasing the document.
en.DocumentPublisherContactDetailsDescripti: Information on how to contact the publisher, possibly including details such as web sites, email addresses, phone numbers, and postal mail addresses.
en.DocumentPublisherIssuingAuthorityDescrip: Provides information about the authority of the issuing party to release the document, in particular, the party's constituency and responsibilities or other obligations.
en.DocumentPublisherNameDescription: Contains the name of the issuing party.
en.DocumentPublisherNamespaceDescription: Contains a URL which is under control of the issuing party and can be used as a globally unique identifier for that issuing party.
en.DocumentReferencesDescription: Holds a list of references associated with the whole document.
en.DocumentSourceLangDescription: If this copy of the document is a translation then the value of this property describes from which language this document was translated.
en.DocumentTitleDescription: This SHOULD be a canonical name for the document, and sufficiently unique to distinguish it from similar documents.
en.DocumentTrackingDescription: Is a container designated to hold all management attributes necessary to track a CSAF document as a whole.
en.DocumentTrackingAliasesDescription: Contains a list of alternate names for the same document.
en.DocumentTrackingAliasesItemsDescription: Specifies a non-empty string that represents a distinct optional alternative ID used to refer to the document.
en.DocumentTrackingCurrentReleaseDateDescri: The date when the current revision of this document was released
en.DocumentTrackingGeneratorDescription: Is a container to hold all elements related to the generation of the document. These items will reference when the document was actually created, including the date it was generated and the entity that generated it.
en.DocumentTrackingGeneratorDateDescription: This SHOULD be the current date that the document was generated. Because documents are often generated internally by a document producer and exist for a nonzero amount of time before being released, this field MAY be different from the Initial Release Date and Current Release Date.
en.DocumentTrackingGeneratorEngineDescripti: Contains information about the engine that generated the CSAF document.
en.DocumentTrackingGeneratorEngineNameDescr: Represents the name of the engine that generated the CSAF document.
en.DocumentTrackingGeneratorEngineVersionDe: Contains the version of the engine that generated the CSAF document.
en.DocumentTrackingIdDescription: The ID is a simple label that provides for a wide range of numbering values, types, and schemes. Its value SHOULD be assigned and maintained by the original document issuing authority.
en.DocumentTrackingInitialReleaseDateDescri: The date when this document was first published.
en.DocumentTrackingRevisionHistoryDescripti: Holds one revision item for each version of the CSAF document, including the initial one.
en.DocumentTrackingRevisionHistoryItemsDesc: Contains all the information elements required to track the evolution of a CSAF document.
en.DocumentTrackingRevisionHistoryItemsDate: The date of the revision entry
en.DocumentTrackingRevisionHistoryItemsLega: Contains the version string used in an existing document with the same content.
en.DocumentTrackingRevisionHistoryItemsSumm: Holds a single non-empty string representing a short description of the changes.
en.DocumentTrackingStatusDescription: Defines the draft status of the document.
en.ProductTreeDescription: Is a container for all fully qualified product names that can be referenced elsewhere in the document.
en.ProductTreeFullProductNamesDescription: Contains a list of full product names.
en.ProductTreeProductGroupsDescription: Contains a list of product groups.
en.ProductTreeProductGroupsItemsDescription: Defines a new logical group of products that can then be referred to in other parts of the document to address a group of products with a single identifier.
en.ProductTreeProductGroupsItemsProductIdsD: Lists the product_ids of those products which known as one group in the document.
en.ProductTreeProductGroupsItemsSummaryDesc: Gives a short, optional description of the group.
en.ProductTreeRelationshipsItemsDescription: Establishes a link between two existing full_product_name_t elements, allowing the document producer to define a combination of two products that form a new full_product_name entry.
en.ProductTreeRelationshipsItemsCategoryDes: Defines the category of relationship for the referenced component.
en.ProductTreeRelationshipsItemsProductRefe: Holds a Product ID that refers to the Full Product Name element, which is referenced as the first element of the relationship.
en.ProductTreeRelationshipsItemsRelatesToPr: Holds a Product ID that refers to the Full Product Name element, which is referenced as the second element of the relationship.
en.VulnerabilitiesDescription: Represents a list of all relevant vulnerability information items.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsDescription: Is a container for the aggregation of all fields that are related to a single vulnerability in the document.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsAcknowledgmentsDescr: Contains a list of acknowledgment elements associated with this vulnerability item.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsCveDescription: Holds the MITRE standard Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) tracking number for the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsCweDescription: Holds the MITRE standard Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) for the weakness associated.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsCweIdDescription: Holds the ID for the weakness associated.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsCweNameDescription: Holds the full name of the weakness as given in the CWE specification.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsDiscoveryDateDescrip: Holds the date and time the vulnerability was originally discovered.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsFlagsDescription: Contains a list of machine readable flags.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsFlagsItemsDescriptio: Contains product specific information in regard to this vulnerability as a single machine readable flag.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsFlagsItemsDateDescri: Contains the date when assessment was done or the flag was assigned.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsIdsDescription: Represents a list of unique labels or tracking IDs for the vulnerability (if such information exists).
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsIdsItemsDescription: Contains a single unique label or tracking ID for the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsIdsItemsSystemNameDe: Indicates the name of the vulnerability tracking or numbering system.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsIdsItemsTextDescript: Is unique label or tracking ID for the vulnerability (if such information exists).
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsInvolvementsItemsDes: Is a container, that allows the document producers to comment on the level of involvement (or engagement) of themselves or third parties in the vulnerability identification, scoping, and remediation process.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsInvolvementsItemsDat: Holds the date and time of the involvement entry.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsInvolvementsItemsPar: Defines the category of the involved party.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsInvolvementsItemsSta: Defines contact status of the involved party.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsInvolvementsItemsSum: Contains additional context regarding what is going on.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsNotesDescription: Holds notes associated with this vulnerability item.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusDescrip: Contains different lists of product_ids which provide details on the status of the referenced product related to the current vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusFirstAf: These are the first versions of the releases known to be affected by the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusFirstFi: These versions contain the first fix for the vulnerability but may not be the recommended fixed versions.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusFixedDe: These versions contain a fix for the vulnerability but may not be the recommended fixed versions.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusKnownAf: These versions are known to be affected by the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusKnownNo: These versions are known not to be affected by the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusLastAff: These are the last versions in a release train known to be affected by the vulnerability. Subsequently released versions would contain a fix for the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusRecomme: These versions have a fix for the vulnerability and are the vendor-recommended versions for fixing the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsProductStatusUnderIn: It is not known yet whether these versions are or are not affected by the vulnerability. However, it is still under investigation - the result will be provided in a later release of the document.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsReferencesDescriptio: Holds a list of references associated with this vulnerability item.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsReleaseDateDescripti: Holds the date and time the vulnerability was originally released into the wild.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsDes: Specifies details on how to handle (and presumably, fix) a vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsCat: Specifies the category which this remediation belongs to.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsDat: Contains the date from which the remediation is available.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsDet: Contains a thorough human-readable discussion of the remediation.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsEnt: Contains any possible vendor-defined constraints for obtaining fixed software or hardware that fully resolves the vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsRes: Provides information on category of restart is required by this remediation to become effective.
Specifies what category of restart is required by this remediation to become effective.
Provides additional information for the restart. This can include details on procedures, scope or impact.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsRemediationsItemsUrl: Contains the URL where to obtain the remediation.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsScoresDescription: contains score objects for the current vulnerability.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsScoresItemsDescripti: specifies information about (at least one) score of the vulnerability and for which products the given value applies.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsThreatsDescription: Contains information about a vulnerability that can change with time.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsThreatsItemsDescript: Contains the vulnerability kinetic information. This information can change as the vulnerability ages and new information becomes available.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsThreatsItemsCategory: Categorizes the threat according to the rules of the specification.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsThreatsItemsDateDesc: Contains the date when the assessment was done or the threat appeared.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsThreatsItemsDetailsD: Represents a thorough human-readable discussion of the threat.
en.VulnerabilitiesItemsTitleDescription: Gives the document producer the ability to apply a canonical name or title to the vulnerability.
